channel.title: Why has Imp-Soft been destroyed?, Why is mopar being attacked?, DISCUSS histor
channel.description:
Why Imp-Soft has been destroyed?
Well a few days lukeidiot joined the forums. He talked about how he had arga. Everyone called him a scammer. He said did a scam, so i found proof and posted it.
Raw's myspace: http://profile.myspace.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=user.viewprofile&friendid=56693250 CACHED: http://64.233.187.104/search?q=cache:Tu2CJRFjFrkJ:profile.myspace.com/index.cfm%3Ffuseaction%3Duser.viewprofile%26friendid%3D56693250+lukeidiot+ar2&hl=en&gl=us&ct=clnk&cd=2&client=opera
Lukeidiots: http://profile.myspace.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=user.viewprofile&friendid=9176720 CACHED: http://64.233.187.104/search?q=cache:S-8wA-G0MP0J:profile.myspace.com/index.cfm%3Ffuseaction%3Duser.viewprofile%26friendid%3D9176720+myspace+9176720&hl=en&gl=us&ct=clnk&cd=1&client=opera
Then after that Ollie found these off of my links.
These were found by Ollie:
[glow=red,2,300]ALIASES:[/glow] APD, Josh, Joshy, RaW, Hitman
[img]http://www.uploadit.biz/uploads/images/835519567_l73829.jpg[/img] [img]http://myspace-037.vo.llnwd.net/01084/73/01/1084361037_l.jpg[/img] [img]http://myspace-913.vo.llnwd.net/01084/31/91/1084341913_l.jpg[/img] [img]http://myspace-628.vo.llnwd.net/01172/82/63/1172573628_l.jpg[/img]
Now i was never asked to have these taken down. Josh aka RaW aka HitMan found out about the pics being public and started to ddos. Basically its about 500mbit/sec . I have lost my ips for the server. The ips are nulled and the DNS entries are now void.
update:
[glow=red,2,300]His ALIASES:[/glow] APD, Josh, Joshy, RaW, Hitman

item.title: Why has Imp-Soft been destroyed?, Why is mopar being attacked?, DISCUSS histor
item.dc:creator: @ruler ruler
item.description:
@ruler wrote:

i doubt he will attack sythe bc sythe “respects” him. RaW will not attack those that respect him.

However RaW has now propably realized he should not have joined irc and talked also he should have never tried to get kib to shutdown all his clients(e-fak, mopar, reint, syi). It was not until raw talked in irc did we all know who was behind it. I was getting ddosed and still am for days before he went after mopar. Even after he went after mopat i didn;t know. It was after i talked to him directly in irc did i know. Then i heard of the conversations he had 2 sayd before with kib. It is imporant to note how much raw knows about everyone. He is not stupid, he talkes to the people who have power and tries to get power. This is how he has always been successful bc past leaders went with it. This time the leaders being kib and mopar are not going with it.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @juju juju
item.description:
@juju wrote:

Aftermath.v2: “Most” do, but some don’t. I don’t see any other way that RaW could control a 4k(or so I hear) botnet other than just making it connect to a website and reading commands - but that would take down that site that is issuing commands. He could also create his own ircd that does is not compatible with the IRC RFC, but, eh.

http://www.vnunet.com/vnunet/news/2144375/botnet-operation-ruled-million

Read full topic

item.source: Why has Imp-Soft been destroyed?, Why is mopar being attacked?, DISCUSS histor

item.title: Why has Imp-Soft been destroyed?, Why is mopar being attacked?, DISCUSS histor
item.dc:creator: @juju juju
item.description:
@juju wrote:

A botnet is a collection of comprimised hosts, generally they act like a worm - they scan IP ranges and find vulnerable IPs/hosts, exploit them & infect them with the botnet software. The newly infected host then joins a IRC server where commands are issued, it thens joins a channel and reads a topic, if there is a command in the topic then the bot will execute the command automatically. Heh, a quick lesson.

http://www.angelfire.com/theforce/travon1120/RxBotCMDLIST.html

There are some of the commands a botnet owner can use, if they’re using rxbot - which is the generally the most popular bot.

Read full topic

item.title: Why has Imp-Soft been destroyed?, Why is mopar being attacked?, DISCUSS histor
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

(had to post because of the hilarious illustration, roflmao)
wikipedia:

  1. A botnet operator sends out viruses or worms, infecting ordinary users’ Windows PCs, whose payload is a trojan application – the bot.
  2. The bot on the infected PC logs into an IRC server, web server. That server is known as the command-and-control server (C&C).
  3. A spammer purchases access to the botnet from the operator.
  4. The spammer sends instructions via the IRC server to the infected PCs…
  5. … causing them to send out spam messages to mail servers.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

Aftermath.v2: If he didn't use a password then anyone would be able to control it. I'm guessing he does use a public scr, even if it was a private one, they pretty much use the same exploits aswell.

I agree with Aftermath, that stealing his botnet network isn’t the way to go. THe illegality of it all isn’t important, but it’s just easier to let RaW get bored. And who knows if your guesses are even right? Even if you are right, you might just escalate the whole nonexistent conflict even more. It’s just RaW being an ass. A good defence is the best retaliation.

Besides, my niggers are already on the way.

Lmao. You got a great imagination man Big Grin

It’s more like, being able to tell the future.

Read full topic

item.title: Why has Imp-Soft been destroyed?, Why is mopar being attacked?, DISCUSS histor
item.dc:creator: @D1e_pl0x D1e pl0x
item.description:
@D1e_pl0x wrote:

PaulT:

[quote]Exactly, dont hassle the lady, she probably has nothing to do with RaW

I can see the makings of a great film here.

Three armed niggers burst into an old lady’s apartnment. One of them has a .38 revolver, the other two have compact glock 20Cs, fully automatic pistols capable of letting off 20 rounds in a few seconds. The door has splintered and it’s laying on the ground. The old lady is sitting in an old rockingchair sipping tea.

“Where the fuck is RaW, bitch?” One of the niggers grabs her hair and pulls her off the chair onto her knees.

“Where, the fuck, is Raw?” He yells again, straight into her ear. She stammers out something which turns into a wail as the tall nigger, the one with the .38, drops a tiny peice of metal into the metal tube, and uses burning gas to propel it into the old ladies knee.

“I don’t know what you want” she screams. She starts to go into shock, and the niggers drop her and start pumping her body with bullets. People all through the old apartment complex start screaming, and one of the niggers pulls a sawed off Benelli out of his boxers.

“Shits about to get hairy. But we’re going to find this motherfucker if we kill everyone who matches these fucking IPs.”

“What the fuck is an IP nigga?”[/quote]
Lmao. You got a great imagination man

Read full topic
